title: Is it really fair to get a leaver buster because of trolls?
body:
There have been numerous games where I would simply dodge because of trolls in champ select
my questions are.
Is it really fair that we must get a leaver buster because we are 100% sure the people in our team are trolls so we decide dodge. so we can avoid another horrible and miserable loss but do you guys think the penalty is worth it or nah?
and..
does anyone know if the league of legends report system actually work? or is it just to be there....{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Just dont swear at trolls because you will get swiftly suspended. Trolling is easier to get away with.

LoL system report does work .  I get instant feed back reports all the time saying someone has been punished.

Leaver buster for dodging queues? - How many times do you dodge? 1 or twice is fine and you get like a 6minute wait time - which is definitely necessary or people would do it all the time.
